title: MEAS MECH_ENG 495-0-28 Selected Topics in Mechanical Engg

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute, Rm A216, 2145 Sheridan Rd, EV CAMPUS

topic: Adv Computational & Statistical Meth for Eng Dsgn

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course is designed for engineering graduate students who are interested in furthering their knowledge in advanced and emerging methods of engineering design, with the focus on computational design methods covering topics such as engineering optimization, simulation-based design, design under uncertainty, decision analysis and preference modeling, multidisciplinary design optimization, and model validation. The course will emphasize both fundamental theories and practical applications. Students are encouraged to apply the techniques taught in class to the topics related to their thesis work.

subject: MECH_ENG
